> Hydras:::
> 
> "It'll exist"replied Hydras while he pulled more close Maxima to 
him 
> and started to kissed her

Against him, she grinned. Then kissed him in return. Protection was 
important for them all. Hydras was indeed showing how valuable he was 
as leader. How much like Megatron he was. 
 
 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > In a message dated 8/8/03 12:44:05 AM Central Daylight Time,

> >

> was one of

> emits... He  once 
> > > built it and it was a full succesfull: nobody inside suffered 
> the heat and 
> > > the base had endless energy.... can you imagine that, my 
dear??? 
> I have all the

> enemies 
> > > attack"
> > >
